abstract: Facebook users can “donate” their status messages to their preferred candidate or political cause or to general get-out-the-vote efforts.
snippet: Facebook users can “donate” their status messages to their preferred candidate or political cause or to general get-out-the-vote efforts.
lead_paragraph: A number of my Facebook friends have “donated” their status messages to candidates, causes or general get-out-the-vote efforts. Here’s a screenshot of the application that allows Facebook members to do this:
